ygData.subject: Re: Weapon Damage [was: L50 (Spoilers)]
ygData.msgSnippet: Also, I hear that there is a shield - Darkwood Shield that has a str booster? Ok, Eqlizer says:  AC 12 and str +9 - anyone know the weight? Says found in High
ygData.messageBody:
Also, I hear that there is a shield - Darkwood Shield that has a str
booster?

Ok, Eqlizer says: AC 12 and str +9 - anyone know the weight? Says found in
High Pass Hold - I heard 100pp or so. Are they very rare or will ppl sell
em? Can a level 13 find a group in HPH?

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 4:56 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapon Damage [was: L50
(Spoilers)]

From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
<Michael.Garramone@...>

some items i have that enhance strength are:

Golden Amber Earrings +3STR each (~100pp pair)
Silver Ruby Veil +4STR +4WIS (~200pp)
Jagged Bands 5AC +3STR each (~150pp each)
Purity Belt +2STR +2STA (~15pp)

i think some lower level items are the spiked collar +3STR,
flesh bands
+2STR each, and the purity belt.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
